name: Square & Circle (RUN)
description:
Hello All,

This is the second entry in my series of square, circle, and one mechanic. For this mechanic I have selected running.

The objective of the game is to run to the exit door as fast as possible while dodging incoming object and controlling your stamina.

As always, the files are open source and can be found in the link below. I have also linked the first game in the series as well. HAVE FUN! I HOPE YOU ENJOY!

https://github.com/capitalKage/Square-and-Circle-Run-

Square & Circle (JUMP)
